https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ttlNczNccKtAU81nOalDUSCACZp.jpg A policeman lunching with his daughter is present when a dead body washes up on shore. He investigates, leading him down a twisted and muddled path of nefarious connections reflecting, somewhat, his own life. Der Gläserne Blick
